overview: This endearing suspense/drama with a powerful cast from some of your favorite shows asks one question: if you leave the underworld, will the underworld ever leave you? Sonny Valentino, an ex-Mafia assassin rehabilitated, is now happily married and settled in an idyllic Long Island suburb. He runs a legitimate pizzeria with his dim-witted and hilarious cousin Lou. It's life and laughs all the way. One day an orphaned streetgirl enters his shop. Befriending one another, she evokes a terrible memory he thought was long gone , unraveling a lifetime of mob murders, strong guilt and a horrific hidden secret.
title: Dark Eyes
